Articles.Content: Is it possible to make a custom agency with custom contracts? (too much "custom" )

You seem to expect an instant reply one way or the other, the forum isn't facebook!

I think that Squad have said that they are moddable, so really you will have better luck raising this in the add-on dev sub-forum... either in the requests or the discussion, either one should get the attention of the people who regularly play around with these things
Im fairly sure that there is a mod out there that will do this

Custom agencies are possible through cfg editing. Custom contracts require making a plugin script. Not sure if agencies can be full locked into only giving out that new custom contract, but I do that I can be given a preference towards certain contracts.

Im fairly sure that there is a mod out there that will do this

If I'm not mistaking B9 adds a new agency and contracts along side the obvious parts.

Adding new agencies can be a little dangerous so I wouldn't do it unless you have some specific reason.

I'm not aware of any way to prevent stock contracts from using a custom agency. If you have any contracts (offered, active, or completed) that use your custom agency and you delete that agency for some reason it will totally brick your save file. There are ways to work around it, but they aren't obvious if you don't already know what you're doing.
